permafrost.tundra.tn.delivery

Class DeliveryQueueHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.tn.delivery.DeliveryQueueHelper

  • public final class DeliveryQueueHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with Trading Networks delivery queues.

      • length

        public static int length(com.wm.app.tn.delivery.DeliveryQueue queue)
                  throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Returns the number of jobs currently queued in the given Trading Networks delivery queue.
        Parameters:
        queue - The queue to return the length of.
        Returns:
        The length of the given queue, which is the number of delivery jobs with a status of QUEUED or DELIVERING.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If a database error occurs.

      • isProcessing

        public static boolean isProcessing(com.wm.app.tn.delivery.DeliveryQueue queue)
        Returns true if the given Trading Networks delivery queue is enabled or draining, and therefore should process queued tasks.
        Parameters:
        queue - The queue to check whether it should process queued tasks.
        Returns:
        True if the given queue should process queued tasks.

      • peek

        public static com.wm.app.tn.delivery.GuaranteedJob peek(com.wm.app.tn.delivery.DeliveryQueue queue,
                                                        boolean ordered)
                                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns the head of the given delivery queue without dequeuing it.
        Parameters:
        queue - The delivery queue whose head job is to be returned.
        ordered - Whether jobs should be dequeued in strict creation datetime first in first out (FIFO) order.
        Returns:
        The job at the head of the given queue, or null if the queue is empty.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database error occurs.

      • peek

        public static com.wm.app.tn.delivery.GuaranteedJob peek(com.wm.app.tn.delivery.DeliveryQueue queue,
                                                        boolean ordered,
                                                        javax.xml.datatype.Duration age)
                                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns the head of the given delivery queue without dequeuing it.
        Parameters:
        queue - The delivery queue whose head job is to be returned.
        ordered - Whether jobs should be dequeued in strict creation datetime first in first out (FIFO) order.
        age - The minimum age a job must be before it can be dequeued.
        Returns:
        The job at the head of the given queue, or null if the queue is empty.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database error occurs.

      • peek

        public static com.wm.app.tn.delivery.GuaranteedJob peek(com.wm.app.tn.delivery.DeliveryQueue queue,
                                                        boolean ordered,
                                                        long age)
                                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns the head of the given delivery queue without dequeuing it.
        Parameters:
        queue - The delivery queue whose head job is to be returned.
        ordered - Whether jobs should be dequeued in strict creation datetime first in first out (FIFO) order.
        age - The minimum age in milliseconds a job must be before it can be dequeued.
        Returns:
        The job at the head of the given queue, or null if the queue is empty.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database error occurs.

      • pop

        public static com.wm.app.tn.delivery.GuaranteedJob pop(com.wm.app.tn.delivery.DeliveryQueue queue,
                                                       boolean ordered)
                                                throws java.sql.SQLException
        Dequeues the job at the head of the given delivery queue.
        Parameters:
        queue - The delivery queue to dequeue the head job from.
        ordered - Whether jobs should be dequeued in strict creation datetime first in first out (FIFO) order.
        Returns:
        The dequeued job that was at the head of the given queue, or null if queue is empty.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database error occurs.
